scenario:
BlackRock, Inc. has informed DSV A/S that it has changed its holding of shares and voting rights in DSV as follows:

- As of 23 December 2024, BlackRock directly or indirectly controls 14,197,676 shares/voting rights in DSV, corresponding to 6.07% of the entire share capital and voting rights in DSV.
- As of 23 December 2024, BlackRock's share capital and voting rights in DSV consisted of 4.90% attached to shares and 1.16% through financial instruments.
- As of 27 December 2024, BlackRock directly or indirectly controls 14,158,223 shares/voting rights in DSV, corresponding to 5.88% of the entire share capital and voting rights in DSV.
- As of 27 December 2024, BlackRock's share capital and voting rights in DSV consisted of 5.04% attached to shares and 0.85% through financial instruments.
